summary: Did you ever wondered that the guards have coloured armors and shields, but no suited bows? Well, now they have!
descriptionHtml:
Did you ever wondered that the guards e.g. in Whiterun DO have coloured armors and shields, but DON\'T have suited weapons, bows or something like that?!

So what does this mod?
 This mod adds these bows! The bows are balanced and they just look great. Every Guard, which is a guard from a hold, gets the suited bow with the suited colours and logos.
 Finally, there is a reason to use the Imperial Bows, which are really ugly in the vanilla-game. 

!I\'m Not updating this file anymore!
Bugs: The Guards who use the bows are in german.
         MAybe the Imperial Sword is renamed in \"Kaiserliches Schwert\". Fix this manually in the CK.

I will be pleased if you add Screenshots!
That is just my fourth mod now, so be kindly!
If you want an equal to this mod just with SWORDs, then look here: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34382
If you want an equal to this mod just with DAGGERS, then look here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34426
IF YOU WANT A COMPILATION OF MY 3 GUARD WEAPONS MODS, then look here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34470

installation: copy all files into the skyrim/data direction

Please Endorse, if you like it!
author: GGinddi
